ya4.1.2:11.1: ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo → avaseso kāyo kāyo (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ya4.1.2:14.1: avasesaṁ rūpaṁ → avasesaṁ rūpaṁ rūpaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ya4.1.2:28.1: ṭhapetvā avaseso mano → avaseso mano mano (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ya4.1.2:33.1: Dhammadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo → avaseso dhammo dhammo (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ya4.1.2:71.1: Avasesā dhātū → avasesā dhātū dhātū (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
